Package game.items

Class FlaskOfCrimsonTears

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.FlaskOfCrimsonTears
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Consumable, Resettable
public class FlaskOfCrimsonTears
extends Item
implements Resettable, Consumable
The vessel from which the healing juice is stored. Player starts with this in their inventory. Is a limited use item. Created by: William-Bata-Kindermann Last Modified By: William Bata-Kindermann
See Also:
Actor, Resettable, Consumable
